item.title: Amy add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "We were not a hugging people. In terms of emotional comfort it was our belief that no amount of physical contact could match the healing powers of a well made cocktail." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Amy add a quote by Chelsea Handler
item.description: "There are two kinds of people I don't trust: people who don't drink and people who collect stickers." -- Chelsea Handler

item.title: Amy add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "And then I felt sad because I realized that once people are broken in certain ways, they can't ever be fixed, and this is something nobody ever tells you when you are young and it never fails to surprise you as you grow older as you see the people in your life break one by one. You wonder when your turn is going to be, or if it's already happened." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Amy add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "My secret is that I need Godâ€”that I am sick and can no longer make it alone. I need God to help me give, because I no longer seem to be capable of giving; to help me be kind, as I no longer seem capable of kindness; to help me love, as I seem beyond being able to love." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Amy add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Beyond a certain age, sincerity ceases to feel pornographic." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Amy add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Remember: the time you feel lonely is the time you most need to be by yourself. Life's cruelest irony." -- Douglas Coupland
